Paula Ingabire Bụ onye Rwandan ọkachamara na teknụzụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Ozi na teknụpụ nkwukọrịta na Innovation, na Cabinet nke Rwanda, kemgbe  ụbọchị 18 Ọktoba 2018.
Ingabire gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Rwanda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere Master of Science na Injinia na Nchịkwa, site na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
Ọ bụ onye Systems Design & Management Fellow na MIT.
Tupu nhọpụta ya ugbu a, Ingabire bụ Onye isi nke Kigali Innovation City initiative
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ nọ n'ọkwa Onye isi nke ICT na Rwanda Development Board.
